meanings.definition: A supernatural being in Islamic mythology.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of powerful jinns who can grant wishes.
meanings.sent2: In the story, the hero encounters friendly jinns on his journey.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous jinns played pranks on the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious jinns were like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The children listened wide-eyed to tales of the magical jinns.

meanings.definition: Plural form of jinn, a supernatural creature in Islamic mythology.
meanings.sent1: The ancient texts mention various types of jinns.
meanings.sent2: People believed that jinns lived in the desert sands.
meanings.sent3: The market was bustling with vendors selling trinkets to ward off jinns.
meanings.sent4: The old ruins were said to be haunted by the spirits of jinns.
meanings.sent5: The travelers whispered about the unseen presence of jinns in the ruins.
